ios.sim.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/PhotoManipulatorExample.xcworkspace -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5s' -scheme PhotoManipulatorExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath ios/build -sdk iphonesimulator -UseModernBuildSystem=NO | xcpretty -k
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 5s

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/PhotoManipulatorExample.xcworkspace -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5s' -scheme PhotoManipulatorExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Release -derivedDataPath ios/build -sdk iphonesimulator -UseModernBuildSystem=NO | xcpretty -k
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 5s

android.emu.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..
android.emu.debug.name: TestingAVD

android.emu.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ..
android.emu.release.name: TestingAVD
